dependencies: Python (requirements.txt): mlflow==2.4.1 (MLflow server), pymysql==1.0.3 (MySQL backend option), psycopg2-binary==2.9.6 (PostgreSQL backend), protobuf==4.23.3, gevent==22.10.2 (gunicorn worker class), boto3==1.26.155 (AWS/S3 artifact store)
architectural_resources: Containerized web application: MLflow Tracking Server (listens behind Nginx; MLflow runs on internal port 5001)
Reverse proxy + HTTP Basic Authentication: Nginx using htpasswd (nginx.conf + scripts/nginx.sh)
Process supervision: supervisord running mlflow and nginx (supervisord.conf)
Relational database for MLflow backend store: PostgreSQL (docker-compose.yml postgres service) and/or MySQL (pymysql dependency; configurable via env vars in scripts/mlflow.sh)
Object storage for artifacts: local filesystem (default ./mlruns) or AWS S3 (boto3 + MLFLOW_ARTIFACT_URI like s3://...; AWS credentials env vars in docker-compose.yml/app.json/README.md)
CI/CD + container registry: GitHub Actions building/pushing to Amazon ECR Public (workflows build_branch.yml/build_tag.yml)
Heroku deployment: container stack with Heroku Postgres addon (heroku.yml, app.json)
(Implied by README) Terraform-based infrastructure for AWS deployment (referenced in README and workflow terraform_validate.yml, but no terraform/ directory present in this repository snapshot)
